title: Fed Minutes Flag Chance of Earlier Hikes
itunes:title: Fed Minutes Flag Chance of Earlier Hikes
description:
Bloomberg News Global Macro Strategist Vincent Cignarella and Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva break news that Federal Reserve officials said a strengthening economy and higher inflation could lead to earlier and faster interest-rate increases than previously expected. Sigal Atzmon, Founder and CEO of Medix Global, shares her thoughts on the spread of the omicron variant and the importance of ramping up testing. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News HighYield and Distressed Credit Reporter Eliza Ronalds-Hannon discuss the Businessweek Magazine cover story Jessica Simpson Is Wrestling Back Billion-Dollar Fashion Empire. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Mark Gurman reports on who's in and who's out at the 2022 Consumer Electronics Show. And we Drive to the Close with Sandy Villere, Portfolio Manager at Villere & Co.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
